name: Missiles
description: Capable of being thrown or projected to strike a distant object

name: Radar

name: Anti-Air Warfare
description: All measures designed to nullify or reduce the effectiveness of hostile air action

name: Anti-Surface Warfare
description: Any weapons, sensors, or operations intended to attack or limit the effectiveness of an adversary's surface ships
